sentence: No food menu in room
Much better salads and fresher
The restaurant was suppose to close at 11
We paid to be upgraded to the Executive floors so got a free and unimpressive breakfast
The club lounge was busy and snacks where okay
Valet tried to charge for another day after they told me there would be no additional charge if I stayed and had dinner at Hotel Trader Vics

I would ’ve liked my sheets changed but the one time we were out all day they said they could n’t do anything because we left something on the bedThe breakfast was great but only because I had vouchers
The executive breakfast is not good either
I do n’t know if this particular one in downtown Atlanta has their rooftop bar managed separately but it was nowhere close to what you expect at a Hilton
Aside from the Hilton Honors desk representatives and wait staff in the 29th floor restaurant everyone else I encountered seemed to be very unhappy to be employed
The people at the bar were very nice and made excellent drinksThe property does not have a real Starbucks
The market place on lobby level has a wide selection of snacks and Starbucks coffee round the clock for jetlaged zombies
However the only saving grace was that the people were extremely nice and the restaurant was surprisingly good
It was nice having the lounge upstairs to have snacks or cocktails in the evening
Restaurants and Executive floor room view is amazing

In the middle of Atlanta minutes from centennial park minutes from Five Points quick check in clean plenty of open space in lobby secure room service two great restaurants inside hotel customer service was outstanding
One of the staff members stole from me and and i was offered breakfast stole all the money in my purse for my birthday weekend
The breakfast team is always helpful courteous and friendly especially Imacula and Fatmata
We also had dinner at the onsite restaurant and really enjoyed our meal
This is at best in the Hampton Inns level even not at Hilton Garden Inns made to order hot breakfast standard
